channel.title: F2P City [The Revolution for Silabsoft has Begun]
channel.description:
[center][color=teal][b]Hello Moparscape Members Welcome to F2P City The ultimate Free to play combat adventure bringing A few memorys back to you for your Ultimate Gaming Experience! [center][img]http://i56.tinypic.com/1zflw9d.jpg[/img][/center]
[b]Download Here[/b] http://uppit.com/tqld8fmi315q/F2p_City.rar
[img]http://i51.tinypic.com/v64zzb.jpg[/img][b]Skills[/b][img]http://i52.tinypic.com/mb51d5.jpg[/img]
[i]So far our skills are improving day by day and heres what we have so far.Im taking my time as i want this to be spot on and fun for you. We currently have:- Correct Chop timers Correct Axes Equip levels Skill Shop Firemaking bends down and burns the fire Crafting all gems and hides Thieve Full added at Ardgoune Thieve NPCs[/i]
[b]Fully working Woodcutting[/b] [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/s43p78.jpg[/img]
[b]Craft Many wears[/b] [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/ibw2fn.jpg[/img]
[b]Firemaking[/b] [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/2ponnf7.jpg[/img]
[b]Thieveing for Money at Ardgoune[/b] [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/sy5wlc.jpg[/img]
[b][img]http://i55.tinypic.com/vgr0og.jpg[/img]PVP Combat[img]http://i55.tinypic.com/nx9pxy.jpg[/img][/b]
[i]We have a great simple combat system keeping it nice and basic to how old pking was.There is no custom what so ever just usual , Rune Armour , Dds , Abyssal whip , Dragon scim etc. No d claws or vesta etc. We have :- Potions Drinking + Draining Food and drink Timers All Specials (drag weps , whip etc) Skulls Prayer (up to 43 only) Working Correct Bonuses Ranger,Mage and Melee Following Varrock Multi Mage Bank Edgeville (main Spot) Drags Pk Hills PK Teleport System in wild Cant Teleport While Pking Cant Teleport Above 20 Wild.[/i]
[b]Cast Magic Spells Upon Your oppenent[/b] [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/zmzh2x.jpg[/img]
[b]Keep an eye on your items before you pk[/b] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/34ec2mc.jpg[/img]
[b][img]http://i55.tinypic.com/vgr0og.jpg[/img]PVNPC Combat[img]http://i55.tinypic.com/nx9pxy.jpg[/img][/b] [i]Our Npc combat is brilliant with a variety of features such as:- Deep Dark Dungeons Magic Casts Correct Range Timers Dharok Hits Low Hp Drops Working Specials [/i]
[b]Travel Deep Down to the Lesser Demons[/b] [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/6ifm95.jpg[/img]
[b]Dialouge Added[/b] [color=teal][i]Can Now talk to your Fellow people around Citys such as Lumbridge Home[/i] [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/faynv9.jpg[/img]

I like how you use member items in this “f2p”.

E: 2 days/5 pages gravedig for the win.
[/quote]

f2p = free to play, so basically dude im giving members for free which is the plan i intended on doing its just a “free to play pk server”[/quote]

Alot servers has member items as free items…

item.title: F2P City [The Revolution for Silabsoft has Begun]
item.dc:creator: @shardyboy shardyboy
item.description:
@shardyboy wrote:

[center][color=teal][b]Hello Moparscape Members Welcome to F2P City The ultimate Free to play combat adventure bringing A few memorys back to you for your Ultimate Gaming Experience!
[center][/center]

Download Here
http://uppit.com/tqld8fmi315q/F2p_City.rar

Skills

So far our skills are improving day by day and heres what we have so far.Im taking my time as i want this to be spot on and fun for you.
We currently have:-
Correct Chop timers
Correct Axes Equip levels
Skill Shop
Firemaking bends down and burns the fire
Crafting all gems and hides
Thieve Full added at Ardgoune
Thieve NPCs

Fully working Woodcutting

s43p78.jpg766×528

Craft Many wears

ibw2fn.jpg764×524

Firemaking

2ponnf7.jpg767×521

Thieveing for Money at Ardgoune

sy5wlc.jpg766×522

PVP Combat

We have a great simple combat system keeping it nice and basic to how old pking was.There is no custom what so ever just usual , Rune Armour , Dds , Abyssal whip , Dragon scim etc. No d claws or vesta etc.
We have :-
Potions Drinking + Draining
Food and drink Timers
All Specials (drag weps , whip etc)
Skulls
Prayer (up to 43 only)
Working Correct Bonuses
Ranger,Mage and Melee Following
Varrock Multi
Mage Bank
Edgeville (main Spot)
Drags Pk
Hills PK
Teleport System in wild
Cant Teleport While Pking
Cant Teleport Above 20 Wild.

Cast Magic Spells Upon Your oppenent

zmzh2x.jpg766×522

Keep an eye on your items before you pk

PVNPC Combat
Our Npc combat is brilliant with a variety of features such as:-
Deep Dark Dungeons
Magic Casts Correct
Range Timers
Dharok Hits Low Hp
Drops Working
Specials

Travel Deep Down to the Lesser Demons

Dialouge Added
[color=teal]Can Now talk to your Fellow people around Citys such as Lumbridge Home

faynv9.jpg766×523

Read full topic
item.source: F2P City [The Revolution for Silabsoft has Begun]
